Text: The Knick is an American television drama series on Cinemax created by Jack Amiel and Michael Begler and directed by Steven Soderbergh.
Triplets:<The Knick
1:
--------------------
Text: The Knick:  The series follows Dr. John W. Thackery (Clive Owen) and the staff at a fictionalized version of the Knickerbocker Hospital (the "Knick") in New York during the early twentieth century.
Triplets:<Dr. John W. Thackery
2:
--------------------
Text: The Knick:  Amiel and Begler write the majority of the episodes and are executive producers.
Triplets:<The Knick
4:
--------------------
Text: The Knick:  Steven Katz is the supervising producer and also writer, Michael Polaire is the producer and David Kirchner is the associate producer.
